#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

using ll = long long;
const ll mod = 1000000007;

ll mpow(ll b, ll e) {
  if (e == 0) return 1;
  ll r = mpow(b, e / 2);
  r = (r * r) % mod;
  if (e % 2 == 1) r = (r * b) % mod;
  return r;
}

int main() {
  const ll i3 = mpow(3, mod - 2);

  ll n, k, m;
  cin >> n >> k >> m; --n;
  if (k == 1) cout << m << endl;
  else if (k == 2) cout << (m + 2LL * m * n) % mod << endl;
  else if (k == 3) {
    ll res = (2 * n * (n + 1)) % mod;
    res = ((1 + res) * m) % mod;
    cout << res << endl;
  } else if (k == 4) {
    ll add = (2 * i3 * n) % mod;
    add = (add * (2LL * n + 1)) % mod;
    add = (add * (n + 1)) % mod;
    add = (m * add) % mod;
    cout << (m + 2 * m * n + add) % mod << endl;
  } else if (k == 5) {
    ll ss = (n * (n + 1)) % mod;
    ll add1 = ((2 + 2 * i3) * ss) % mod;
    add1 = (m * add1) % mod;
    ll add2 = (2 * ss * ss) % mod;
    add2 = (add2 * i3) % mod;
    add2 = (m * add2) % mod;
    cout << (m + add1 + add2) % mod << endl;
  }
}
